artist: Artist: Walter Gramatté; Author: Nikolai Gogol; Translator: Felix Gaber; Publisher: Gustav Kiepenheuer Verlag Potsdam-Berlin
description: bound volume with text in German; front and back covers in red and beige marble-like patterend paper; author and title in gold lettering on cream-colored spine; contains 12 lithographs by Gramatté; inscribed in pencil and in German on second blank page of book by Gramatté and dated May 1920
signed: LR in pencil below first image in book: Walter Gramatté / 19 | LR in pencil below remaining 11 images: W Gramatté / 19
title: Der Mantel (The Coat)
